meanings.definition: To utter a sound expressing hesitation or doubt.
meanings.sent1: She was hawing before answering the difficult question.
meanings.sent2: The man kept hawing before finally agreeing to the plan.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was hawing playfully at the unfamiliar toy.
meanings.sent4: His voice was hawing like a broken record, unsure of what to say.
meanings.sent5: The hawing of the wind outside made her feel uncertain about going out.

meanings.definition: The act of making a sound expressing hesitation or doubt.
meanings.sent1: His constant hawing during the meeting annoyed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The audience could hear the hawing from the speaker as he paused.
meanings.sent3: The hawing of the old car engine made it seem unsure of starting.
meanings.sent4: The hawing of the cow in the field sounded like it was questioning something.
meanings.sent5: The hawing of the owl in the night added an eerie feeling to the forest.
